welcome1: Welcome to our website. You want to test your Scratch program and don't know how?
Use our Whisker-Tools to write or automatically generate tests.
welcome2: Upload your Scratch *.sb3-File and/or tests and use Whisker to test your program.
You get information on which tests failed as well as your achieved sprite coverage.
choose-file: Choose a file of your desktop.
